Professional construction cleaning services to keep your construction site in perfect condition

section1.title: Construction cleaning - to the finishing touch
section1.description: Do you want a flexible and competent construction cleaning partner to carry out construction cleaning for you throughout the entire construction phase? Then you've come to the right place! We'll accompany you from the start of construction to the handover of the keys, ensuring your construction site remains clean and well-maintained from start to finish.

section2.title: Construction Cleaning by Experts
section2.description: Our team delivers reliable construction cleaning, from rough site cleanups to the final polish before handover. We coordinate with all parties to ensure your project is spotless, safe, and ready for its next phase. With flexible scheduling and attention to detail, we make sure nothing is left to chance—so you can focus on building, not cleaning.

hero.description: Do you have any questions or would you like a customized quote? Contact us – we look forward to hearing from you! Use our form, call us, or send us an email. We're happy to help!

section1.title: Clearances & Disposals
section1.description: Clearances can be quite stressful. Relax and let us clear your property. We are your professionals when it comes to clearances, clearing out, and disposal. We clear your property and clean it thoroughly. From attics to garages, from pianos to wooden cabinets, we clear and dispose of all materials. This includes specialty materials such as paints, cleaning agents, acids, etc. Benefit from our affordable prices. The disposal fees are passed on directly to you. You only pay for the work!
section1.subDescription: Whether it's household clearances, evictions, company liquidations or messy apartments – we're up for any mess!

section2.title: Environmentally friendly disposal
section2.description: Environmental protection is a top priority for us. We offer compliant waste separation for clearances, clearing out, and disposal services. This not only benefits the environment, but also saves you, the customer, a considerable amount of money. Disposal costs vary depending on the material. For example, disposing of wood is almost 20% cheaper than disposing of bulky waste. Materials that are no longer needed are recycled. With our waste separation, we ensure the most cost-effective clearance possible.

partner.title: Our partner for environmentally friendly disposal
partner.subtitle: Working together for a sustainable future

services.title: Services
services.description: As a clearance company, we will provide you with an optimal offer after a preliminary inspection. We will give you a credit for any items we can resell with your consent. If you would like a final cleaning after the clearance, we would, of course, be happy to provide this, including a purchase guarantee.

section1.title: Professional garden care
section1.description: A garden is a wonderful thing! A place to relax and enjoy, to celebrate and feel good. Less popular, however, is the time-consuming and labor-intensive work involved in hedge or tree trimming. With our services, you can enjoy the peace and quiet of your property and leave garden maintenance to experienced and motivated gardeners who, with passion and attention to detail, will take care of both garden design and recurring tasks like tree trimming and shrub pruning.

aargau.title: Your garden care in Aargau
aargau.description: Gardening is a relaxing and fulfilling activity for many people. However, in Aargau, in particular, it can be particularly challenging due to the changeable climate and unique soil conditions. With the right tips and tricks, however, even a garden in Aargau can be successfully maintained and designed. Those who are unsure about gardening in Aargau or lack the time can also seek the help of professional gardeners. They are familiar with the unique challenges of Aargau's climate and soil and can provide support with garden maintenance.

section1.title: Your caretaker company for professional property maintenance
section1.description: Our team consists of highly qualified and experienced caretakers with extensive knowledge and expertise in all aspects of building maintenance. We offer our clients customized property maintenance services tailored to each client's specific needs.
section1.description2: As a reliable property management company, we understand that the appearance and condition of a building greatly influence the impression it makes on customers and guests. Therefore, we always strive to ensure that all the buildings we manage are in perfect condition, whether through interior cleaning, exterior maintenance, or troubleshooting technical issues.
section1.description3: With M&G Clean, you benefit from a single point of contact for all areas: from the boiler room to the stairwell to the garden. Our property maintenance services include not only regular maintenance and repair of technical equipment, but also cleaning and maintenance of the interior and exterior areas of your property.

section2.title: A caretaker is an all-rounder – cleaning, repairing, maintaining, monitoring.
section2.description: A caretaker company is responsible for the upkeep and maintenance of residential and commercial buildings, industrial buildings, schools, and public buildings. Their duties and responsibilities vary depending on the size and technical equipment of the property. A distinction is made between caretakers with predominantly practical duties and those with predominantly organizational tasks.
section2.description2: We also offer comprehensive organizational support, from coordinating tradespeople to managing documentation. By working with M&G Clean, you can rest assured that all aspects of your property will be handled professionally and efficiently, allowing you to focus on your core business.

section3.title: Property maintenance is a matter of trust.
section3.description: We offer a comprehensive range of facility management services. As our name M&G Clean suggests, our company encompasses all the services required for optimal property maintenance.
section3.description2: With over 1000 apartments in various properties under our management, we are characterized by a flexible, customer-oriented service that is aimed at both property management companies and private customers.
section3.description3: Trust M&G Clean for reliable, professional, and all-encompassing property maintenance solutions tailored to your needs.

section4.title: Well maintained all around.
section4.description: The tasks assigned to us are completed on time and professionally. We support you with tasks such as minor repairs, maintenance work, and property cleaning. Our trained team also takes care of the proper disposal of bulky waste and the clearing out of messy apartments. Please feel free to contact us if you need expert assistance. We take care of professional property maintenance.

hero.title: Solar System Cleaning
hero.subtitle: Professional solar system cleaning services to keep your solar systems in perfect condition

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.description: We attach great importance to sustainability and environmental protection. That's why we only use reverse osmosis water to clean your photovoltaic system.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: A clean photovoltaic system produces more energy and thus helps reduce your electricity costs. Our professional cleaning ensures that your system operates efficiently over the long term.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: The safety of your solar system and our cleaning team is very important to us. Therefore, we adhere to the highest safety standards when conducting every cleaning.

importance.title: Why regular cleaning of your photovoltaic system is important
importance.description: Dirt, dust, bird droppings, and environmental influences can cause photovoltaic systems to lose efficiency. Regular cleaning not only extends the lifespan of your solar system but also increases energy production—and thus saves money.

efficiency.title: We ensure maximum efficiency of your photovoltaic system
efficiency.description: We offer an efficient, environmentally friendly, and cost-effective solution for maintaining your solar panels in optimal condition. Our cleaning professionals use modern, gentle techniques and environmentally friendly equipment to clean the panels without damaging them.

frequency.question: How often should I have my photovoltaic system cleaned?
frequency.answer: It is recommended to clean the solar system at least once a year, depending on environmental conditions.

selfCleaning.question: Can I clean my solar system myself?
selfCleaning.answer: Improper cleaning can damage the modules. We recommend hiring a professional.

methods.question: What cleaning methods do you use?
methods.answer: We use only reverse osmosis water and gentle techniques to maintain your solar modules.
